title: He-Man and the Masters of the Universe: A Character Guide and World Compendium
description: This is the most comprehensive guide ever published, covering all things  Masters of the Universe  and  Princess of Power  from 1982 through today! The universe of He-Man and She-Ra is full of mystery. And thanks to over four thousand individual entries covering characters, beasts, vehicles, locations, weapons and magic, you can learn the secrets of this entire universe!
author: Val Staples
